Interface BaseEnquiryService

All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicantEnquiryService, ManagerEnquiryService, OfficerEnquiryService
All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryServiceImpl
public interface BaseEnquiryService
Base service interface defining common enquiry operations. Shared by Applicant, Officer, and Manager services.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addMessage(int enquiryId, String msg, String senderNric)
    Adds a message to an existing enquiry.
    Optional<Enquiry>
    getEnquiryById(int enquiryId)
    Retrieves an enquiry by its ID.

  • Method Details

    • getEnquiryById

      Optional<Enquiry> getEnquiryById(int enquiryId)
      Retrieves an enquiry by its ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the enquiry ID
      Returns:
      Optional containing Enquiry if found

    • addMessage

      boolean addMessage(int enquiryId, String msg, String senderNric)
      Adds a message to an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the ID of the enquiry
      msg - the message content
      senderNric - NRIC of the user sending the message
      Returns:
      true if successfully added, false otherwise
